Do you have any work to do?
column4: Take a quick break if you're exhausted. Download goodDay on your phone. Then you should probably get your work done well.

column2: Have you been working a lot?
column4: Relax your mind if you've been working a lot.

column2: Have you been working a lot?
column4: Find something new to enrich yourself and inch toward your life goals.

column2: Use your boredom as time to think; who do you want to be and what can you do to get there? What can you do to be able to do what you need to do?
column3: I don't know what I can do
column4: I like going down the Google Search rabbit hole on something I care about.

column2: What has interested you in the past? Think and turn it into something new and creative.

column1: I'm out of things to play
column4: It's a great learning opportunity where you'll never run out of material again.
